title: BRIEF-St Barbara Revises FY20 Gwalia (Australia) Gold Production Guidance
text:
BRIEF-St Barbara Revises FY20 Gwalia (Australia) Gold Production Guidance

Commodities 20 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 11:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-St Barbara Revises FY20 Gwalia (Australia) Gold Production Guidance Oct 18 (Reuters) - St Barbara Ltd : * GWALIA (AUSTRALIA) GOLD PRODUCTION FOR FY20 IS REVISED TO BETWEEN 175,000 AND 190,000 OUNCES * FY20 ATLANTIC GOLD IS FORECAST TO PRODUCE BETWEEN 95,000 AND 105,000 OUNCES * FY20 SUSTAINING CAPEX FOR GWALIA IS FORECAST TO BE BETWEEN A$60 TO A$65 MILLION * SIMBERI (PNG) PRODUCTION AND COST GUIDANCE REMAINS UNCHANGED FOR FY20, WITH Q1 PRODUCTION AND COSTS IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS * SEES FY20 ATLANTIC GOLD SUSTAINING CAPEX OF BETWEEN A$13 TO A$17 MILLION, EXPLORATION OF BETWEEN A$11 AND A$13 MILLION * Q1FY20 CONSOLIDATED PRODUCTION 87,569 OZ

BRIEF-St Barbara Revises FY20 Gwalia (Australia) Gold Production Guidance
description: BRIEF-St Barbara Revises FY20 Gwalia (Australia) Gold Production Guidance
